verses.text:
And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H5810"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \add and\add* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them the \w dens|strong="H4492"\w* which \add are\add* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w caves|strong="H4631"\w*, and strong \w holds|strong="H4679"\w*.\f + \fr 6.2 \ft prevailed: Heb. was strong\f*

And \add so\add* it was, when \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*, that the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*, even they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against them;

And they \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* against them, and \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* the \w increase|strong="H2981"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, till thou \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, and \w left|strong="H7604"\w* no \w sustenance|strong="H4241"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, neither \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, nor \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, nor \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft sheep: or goat\f*

For they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with their \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* and their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w as|strong="H1767"\w* \w grasshoppers|strong="H0697"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*; \add for\add* both they and their \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* were without \w number|strong="H4557"\w*: and they \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* it.

And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* was \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w impoverished|strong="H1809"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*; and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And it came to pass, when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w because|strong="H0182"\w* of the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*,

That the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* a \w prophet|strong="H0376"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I brought you \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and brought you \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*;  +  r 6.8  t a prophet: Heb. a man a prophet *

And I \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* you out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of all that \w oppressed|strong="H3905"\w* you, and drave them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* you their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*;

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, in whose \w land|strong="H0776"\w* ye \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*: but ye have not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

¶ And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* under an \w oak|strong="H0424"\w* which \add was\add* in \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w*, that \add pertained\add* unto \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* the \w Abi-ezrite|strong="H0033"\w*: and his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w threshed|strong="H2251"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* by the \w winepress|strong="H1660"\w*, to \w hide|strong="H5127"\w* \add it\add* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*.\f + \fr 6.11 \ft Gideon: Gr. Gedeon\f*\f + \fr 6.11 \ft to hide…: Heb. to cause it to flee\f*

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* with thee, thou \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* man of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*.

And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Oh|strong="H0994"\w* my \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w if|strong="H3426"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be with us, why then is all this \w befallen|strong="H4672"\w* us? and where \add be\add* all his \w miracles|strong="H6381"\w* which our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* us of, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Did not the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* bring us \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*? but now the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w* us, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* us into the \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* upon him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* in this thy \w might|strong="H3581"\w*, and thou shalt \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*: have not I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Oh|strong="H0994"\w* my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w wherewith|strong="H4100"\w* shall I \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? behold, my \w family|strong="H0504"\w* \add is\add* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* in \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, and I \add am\add* the \w least|strong="H6810"\w* in my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 6.15 \ft my family…: Heb. my thousand is the meanest\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Surely I will be with thee, and thou shalt \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, If now I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, then \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* me a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* that thou \w talkest|strong="H1696"\w* with me.

\w Depart|strong="H4185"\w* not hence, I pray thee, until I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, and bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* my \w present|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3240"\w* \add it\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w tarry|strong="H3427"\w* until thou come \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 6.18 \ft present: or, meat offering\f*

¶ And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and made \w ready|strong="H6213"\w* a \w kid|strong="H5795"\w*, and unleavened \w cakes|strong="H4682"\w* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*: the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* in a \w basket|strong="H5536"\w*, and he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w broth|strong="H4839"\w* in a \w pot|strong="H6517"\w*, and brought \add it\add* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto him under the \w oak|strong="H0424"\w*, and \w presented|strong="H5066"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 6.19 \ft a kid: Heb. a kid of the goats\f*

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* and the unleavened \w cakes|strong="H4682"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H3240"\w* \add them\add* upon \w this|strong="H1975"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* the \w broth|strong="H4839"\w*. And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so.

¶ Then the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* that \add was\add* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* and the unleavened \w cakes|strong="H4682"\w*; and there rose \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* out of the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, and \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* and the unleavened \w cakes|strong="H4682"\w*. Then the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w departed|strong="H1980"\w* out of his \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

And when \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w perceived|strong="H7200"\w* that he \add was\add* an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*! for \w because|strong="H3651"\w* I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* unto thee; \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: thou shalt not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Then \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* there unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* it \w Jehovah-shalom|strong="H3073"\w*: unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* it \add is\add* yet in \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w* of the \w Abi-ezrites|strong="H0033"\w*.\f + \fr 6.24 \ft Jehovah-shalom: that is, The \+nd LORD\+nd* send peace\f*

¶ And it came to pass the same \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w young|strong="H6499"\w* \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w*, even the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* of \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* years \w old|strong="H8141"\w*, and throw \w down|strong="H2040"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* that thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* hath, and cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w* that \add is\add* by it:\f + \fr 6.25 \ft even: or, and\f*

And \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of this \w rock|strong="H4581"\w*, in the ordered \w place|strong="H4634"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* a burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w* with the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w* which thou shalt cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w*.\f + \fr 6.26 \ft rock: Heb. strong place\f*\f + \fr 6.26 \ft in the ordered…: or, in an orderly manner\f*

Then \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto him: and \add so\add* it was, because he \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, that he could not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

¶ And when the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* arose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, behold, the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* was cast \w down|strong="H5422"\w*, and the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w* was cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* that \add was\add* by it, and the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* was \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \add that was\add* \w built|strong="H1129"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, Who hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*? And when they \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* and \w asked|strong="H1245"\w*, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

Then the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, Bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, that he may \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: because he hath cast \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and because he hath cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w* that \add was\add* by it.

And \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* against him, Will ye \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* for \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*? will ye \w save|strong="H3467"\w* him? he that will \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* for him, let him be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w* whilst \add it is yet\add* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: if he \add be\add* a \w god|strong="H0430"\w*, let him \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* for himself, because \add one\add* hath cast \w down|strong="H5422"\w* his \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

Therefore on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* against him, because he hath thrown \w down|strong="H5422"\w* his \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.\f + \fr 6.32 \ft Jerubbaal: that is, Let Baal plead\f*\f + \fr 6.32 \ft Jerubbesheth: that is, Let the shameful thing plead\f*

¶ Then all the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* and the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* were \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, and went \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

But the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H3847"\w* upon \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, and he \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*; and \w Abi-ezer|strong="H0044"\w* was \w gathered|strong="H2199"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.\f + \fr 6.34 \ft came…: Heb. clothed\f*\f + \fr 6.34 \ft gathered: Heb. called\f*

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* throughout all \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*; who also was \w gathered|strong="H2199"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him: and he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, and unto \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, and unto \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*; and they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* them.\f + \fr 6.35 \ft gathered: Heb. called\f*

¶ And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, If thou \w wilt|strong="H3426"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, as thou hast \w said|strong="H1696"\w*,

Behold, I will \w put|strong="H3322"\w* a \w fleece|strong="H1492"\w* of \w wool|strong="H6785"\w* in the \w floor|strong="H1637"\w*; \add and\add* if the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* be on the \w fleece|strong="H1492"\w* only, and \add it be\add* \w dry|strong="H2721"\w* upon all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add beside\add*, then shall I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou wilt \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, as thou hast \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

And it was so: for he rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, and \w thrust|strong="H2115"\w* the \w fleece|strong="H1492"\w* \w together|strong="H2115"\w*, and \w wringed|strong="H4680"\w* the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* out of the \w fleece|strong="H1492"\w*, a \w bowl|strong="H5602"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, Let not thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* be \w hot|strong="H2734"\w* against me, and I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* but this \w once|strong="H6471"\w*: let me \w prove|strong="H5254"\w*, I pray thee, but this \w once|strong="H6471"\w* with the \w fleece|strong="H1492"\w*; let it now be \w dry|strong="H2721"\w* only upon the \w fleece|strong="H1492"\w*, and upon all the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* let there be \w dew|strong="H2919"\w*.

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: for it was \w dry|strong="H2721"\w* upon the \w fleece|strong="H1492"\w* only, and there was \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* on all the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.
